definition: Matsushima (name)/Matsushima town and national park in Miyagi prefecture, Japan
loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: Two hundred years ago, Ascension Island was a barren volcanic edifice.
sentences.chinese: 两百年前，阿森松岛是一个贫瘠的火山结构残迹。

sentences.english: Pine Island glacier (PIG) is one of many at the fringes of the West Antarctic ice sheet.
sentences.chinese: 松岛冰川是位于南极西陲冰原上众多冰川中的一个。

sentences.english: Pine Island Bay is tucked into a corner of the West Antarctic’s Walgreen Coast.
sentences.chinese: 松岛湾位于是西南极洲的沃尔格林海岸。

sentences.english: The Pine Island Glacier flows out of Antarctica's Hudson Mountains and floats over the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 松岛冰川从南极的哈德逊山脉流出浮在海面上。

sentences.english: The Pine Island Glacier flows out of Antarctica’s Hudson Mountains and floats over the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 松岛冰川从南极的哈德逊山脉流出浮在海面上。

sentences.english: Ascension was discovered by the Portuguese in 1501.
sentences.chinese: 阿森松岛是葡萄牙人于1501年出现的。

sentences.english: In the case of the Pine IslandGlacier it may already be occurring.
sentences.chinese: 在松岛冰川，这种情况可能已经发生了。

sentences.english: Ascension was a strategic base for the Royal Navy.
sentences.chinese: 阿森松岛是皇家海军的战略基地。

definition: Itsukushima island in Hiroshima prefecture, Japan, with a famous shrine
